name: Pixel Dash 2
description: Pixel Dash 2 is the long awaited sequel to the original Pixel Dash. Pixel Dash 2 offers up fresh and new ideas with a hint of multiplayer. Pixel Dash 2 is more polished and fleshed out game with new themes and a fresh continued to the original Pixel Dash storyline and lore, it even has a fully fleshed out multiplayer minigame#! Pixel Dash 2, like Pixel Dash 1 is for all types of people whether your speed running, or you just want to mellow out after a long day, Pixel Dash 2 is a sure fire way to pick you up!
